title: Beit Yisrael (Ruzhin)

titles.text: The Praise of his Holy Sons

nodes.title: The Praise of his Holy Sons
nodes.key: The Praise of his Holy Sons

enDesc: Beit Yisrael is a collection of teachings from 19th-century chasidic leader Rabbi Yisrael Friedman, known as the Ruzhiner Rebbe, published together with material written by his sons under the title Siach Sarfei Kodesh. These teachings include stories and Torah insights, and were collected and edited by Rabbi Reuven Zack as a sequel to his Kenesset Yisrael compilation, published a number of years earlier. The editor’s introduction includes a justification of having published material that was not published by the author, arguing that certainly the rebbes would want as many people to study their teachings as possible.
enShortDesc: Collection of chasidic teachings and Torah insights of the Ruzhiner Rebbe and his sons.
